languages.text: {n}Абеляр медлит. Наконец, вздохнув, опускает голову.{/n} "Я... не видел ее, Лорд-капитан. Но иногда... иногда словно слышу ее смех на отдалении. Или как будто чувствую, что руки касаются — как она делала, когда пыталась отвлечь от горестных раздумий... Но я отличаю явь от миража. Боюсь, теперь придется просто научиться жить с этим призраком, который является только мне. Видением ушедшего".

traits.locale_text: {n}Абеляр медлит. Наконец, вздохнув, опускает голову.{/n} "Я... не видел ее, Лорд-капитан. Но иногда... иногда словно слышу ее смех на отдалении. Или как будто чувствую, что руки касаются — как она делала, когда пыталась отвлечь от горестных раздумий... Но я отличаю явь от миража. Боюсь, теперь придется просто научиться жить с этим призраком, который является только мне. Видением ушедшего".

languages.text: {n}Abelard hesitates. After a few moments, he sighs and hangs his head.{/n} "I... I have not seen her, Lord Captain. But there are times... there are times when I think I hear her laughing in the distance. Or... or I sense hands touching me, as she used to do to distract me from my sorrowful ruminations... But I know the difference between reality and fantasy. Now, I fear, I shall simply have to learn to live with this ghost that appears only to me. With this vision of the past."

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德犹豫半晌，随后他叹了口气，垂下了头。{/n}“我……没有再见过她了，舰长大人。但有的时候……有的时候，我似乎听到了她的笑声从远处传来，或是感觉到她的手在抚摸我。以前，每当我感到悲伤的时候，她都会这么做，转移我的注意力……不过，我知道现实与幻想之间的区别。如今，我恐怕不得不与这个只会出现在我面前的幽灵一起生活，带着过去的幻象活下去。”
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard hesitates. After a few moments, he sighs and hangs his head.{/n} "I... I have not seen her, Lord Captain. But there are times... there are times when I think I hear her laughing in the distance. Or... or I sense hands touching me, as she used to do to distract me from my sorrowful ruminations... But I know the difference between reality and fantasy. Now, I fear, I shall simply have to learn to live with this ghost that appears only to me. With this vision of the past."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德犹豫半晌，随后他叹了口气，垂下了头。{/n}“我……没有再见过她了，舰长大人。但有的时候……有的时候，我似乎听到了她的笑声从远处传来，或是感觉到她的手在抚摸我。以前，每当我感到悲伤的时候，她都会这么做，转移我的注意力……不过，我知道现实与幻想之间的区别。如今，我恐怕不得不与这个只会出现在我面前的幽灵一起生活，带着过去的幻象活下去。”

languages.original_text: {n}Abelard hesitates. After a few moments, he sighs and hangs his head.{/n} "I... have not seen her, Lord Captain. But there are times... there are times when I think I hear her laughing in the distance. Or I sense hands touching me, as she used to do to distract me from my sorrowful ruminations... But I know the difference between reality and fantasy. Now, I fear, I shall simply have to learn to live with this ghost that appears only to me. With this vision of the past."

languages.text: {n}Abelard titubea. Al cabo de unos momentos, suspira y agacha la cabeza.{/n} «No... no la he visto, Lord Capitán. Pero en ocasiones... en ocasiones me parece oírla reír a lo lejos. O siento que sus manos me tocan como hacía cuando buscaba distraerme de mis pensamientos... Pero sé distinguir la realidad de la ficción. Tendré que aprender a vivir con este fantasma que solo se me aparece a mí. Con esta visión del pasado».
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard hesitates. After a few moments, he sighs and hangs his head.{/n} "I... I have not seen her, Lord Captain. But there are times... there are times when I think I hear her laughing in the distance. Or... or I sense hands touching me, as she used to do to distract me from my sorrowful ruminations... But I know the difference between reality and fantasy. Now, I fear, I shall simply have to learn to live with this ghost that appears only to me. With this vision of the past."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard titubea. Al cabo de unos momentos, suspira y agacha la cabeza.{/n} «No... no la he visto, Lord Capitán. Pero en ocasiones... en ocasiones me parece oírla reír a lo lejos. O siento que sus manos me tocan como hacía cuando buscaba distraerme de mis pensamientos... Pero sé distinguir la realidad de la ficción. Tendré que aprender a vivir con este fantasma que solo se me aparece a mí. Con esta visión del pasado».

languages.text: {n}アベラルドはためらった。しばらくの後、ため息をついて頭を垂れる。{/n}「私は…彼女を見たことはありません、ロード・キャプテン。ですが、時々…ほんの時々、遠くで彼女の笑い声が聞こえるような気がするのです。あるいは、彼女が私が嘆き、回顧することから気をそらすためにしてくれたように、手が触れるのを感じることすらあります…。ですが、現実と空想の違いはわかっています。今、私は、己にだけ現れるこの亡霊と、過去の幻影とともに生きることを学ばなければなりません」
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard hesitates. After a few moments, he sighs and hangs his head.{/n} "I... I have not seen her, Lord Captain. But there are times... there are times when I think I hear her laughing in the distance. Or... or I sense hands touching me, as she used to do to distract me from my sorrowful ruminations... But I know the difference between reality and fantasy. Now, I fear, I shall simply have to learn to live with this ghost that appears only to me. With this vision of the past."

traits.locale_text: {n}アベラルドはためらった。しばらくの後、ため息をついて頭を垂れる。{/n}「私は…彼女を見たことはありません、ロード・キャプテン。ですが、時々…ほんの時々、遠くで彼女の笑い声が聞こえるような気がするのです。あるいは、彼女が私が嘆き、回顧することから気をそらすためにしてくれたように、手が触れるのを感じることすらあります…。ですが、現実と空想の違いはわかっています。今、私は、己にだけ現れるこの亡霊と、過去の幻影とともに生きることを学ばなければなりません」

languages.text: {n}Abelard zögert. Nach einigen Augenblicken seufzt er und lässt den Kopf hängen.{/n} "Ich ... habe sie nicht gesehen, Lord Captain. Doch manchmal ... manchmal glaube ich, sie in der Ferne lachen zu hören. Oder ich spüre Hände, die mich berühren, wie sie es getan hat, um mich aus meinen trübseligen Gedanken zu reißen ... Ich kenne jedoch den Unterschied zwischen Realität und Fantasie. Ich muss wohl schlicht lernen, mit diesem Geist zu leben, der nur mir scheint. Mit dieser Vision der Vergangenheit."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard hesitates. After a few moments, he sighs and hangs his head.{/n} "I... I have not seen her, Lord Captain. But there are times... there are times when I think I hear her laughing in the distance. Or... or I sense hands touching me, as she used to do to distract me from my sorrowful ruminations... But I know the difference between reality and fantasy. Now, I fear, I shall simply have to learn to live with this ghost that appears only to me. With this vision of the past."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard zögert. Nach einigen Augenblicken seufzt er und lässt den Kopf hängen.{/n} "Ich ... habe sie nicht gesehen, Lord Captain. Doch manchmal ... manchmal glaube ich, sie in der Ferne lachen zu hören. Oder ich spüre Hände, die mich berühren, wie sie es getan hat, um mich aus meinen trübseligen Gedanken zu reißen ... Ich kenne jedoch den Unterschied zwischen Realität und Fantasie. Ich muss wohl schlicht lernen, mit diesem Geist zu leben, der nur mir scheint. Mit dieser Vision der Vergangenheit."

languages.text: {n}Abélard hésite un instant, puis il soupire et baisse la tête.{/n} « Non, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Mais parfois... parfois, j'ai l'impression d'entendre son rire au loin, ou je sens des mains me toucher, comme elle le faisait pour me tirer de mes lugubres ruminations... Heureusement, je sais distinguer la réalité du fantasme. J'ai bien peur qu'il me faille simplement apprendre à vivre avec ce fantôme qui n'apparaît qu'à moi. Avec cette vision du passé. »
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard hesitates. After a few moments, he sighs and hangs his head.{/n} "I... I have not seen her, Lord Captain. But there are times... there are times when I think I hear her laughing in the distance. Or... or I sense hands touching me, as she used to do to distract me from my sorrowful ruminations... But I know the difference between reality and fantasy. Now, I fear, I shall simply have to learn to live with this ghost that appears only to me. With this vision of the past."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abélard hésite un instant, puis il soupire et baisse la tête.{/n} « Non, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Mais parfois... parfois, j'ai l'impression d'entendre son rire au loin, ou je sens des mains me toucher, comme elle le faisait pour me tirer de mes lugubres ruminations... Heureusement, je sais distinguer la réalité du fantasme. J'ai bien peur qu'il me faille simplement apprendre à vivre avec ce fantôme qui n'apparaît qu'à moi. Avec cette vision du passé. »

languages.text: {n}Abelard tereddüt ediyor. Bir müddet sonra iç çekip başını öne eğiyor.{/n} "Hayır... Görmedim Lord Kaptan. Fakat bazen... Bazen uzakta bir yerde gülüşünü duyar gibi oluyorum. Yahut ellerinin dokunuşunu hissediyorum. Tıpkı eskiden kasvetli düşüncelere daldığımda beni çekip çıkarmak için yaptığı gibi. Bunların hayalden ibaret olduğunu biliyorum elbette. Korkarım yalnız benim gördüğüm bu hayaletle, maziden kalan bu parçayla yaşamayı öğrenmem gerekecek."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard hesitates. After a few moments, he sighs and hangs his head.{/n} "I... I have not seen her, Lord Captain. But there are times... there are times when I think I hear her laughing in the distance. Or... or I sense hands touching me, as she used to do to distract me from my sorrowful ruminations... But I know the difference between reality and fantasy. Now, I fear, I shall simply have to learn to live with this ghost that appears only to me. With this vision of the past."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard tereddüt ediyor. Bir müddet sonra iç çekip başını öne eğiyor.{/n} "Hayır... Görmedim Lord Kaptan. Fakat bazen... Bazen uzakta bir yerde gülüşünü duyar gibi oluyorum. Yahut kasvetli düşüncelere dalmışken beni bunlardan uzaklaştırmak için tenime dokunduğunu hissediyorum âdeta, eskiden yaptığı gibi... Lakin bunların hayalden ibaret olduğunu biliyorum. Korkarım yalnız benim gördüğüm bu hayaletle yaşamayı öğrenmem gerekecek. Maziden kalan bu parçayla."
